title: Episode 22: The Legend of the Goatman (LIVE SHOW)
description:
It seems like every state has their own version of how the Goatman came to be. Is it the result of a science experiment gone wrong, the offspring of a farmer that loved his flock way too much, or some teens playing a prank on an entire city?

itunes:author: Cloud10 and iHeartPodcasts
itunes:subtitle: Is the Goatman just an urban legend told to scare horny teens or is there really a 7 ft. tall axe-wielding creature roaming the backwoods at night?  You be the judge.  Recorded live at Dallas Comedy House!
